Sorting Algorithms

Published: Jul 5, 2019 ｜ Author: ssrzz

Quick Sort

def quicksort(arr, start=0, end=0):
    if start >= end:
        return
    pindex = partition(arr, start, end)
    quicksort(arr, start, pindex - 1)
    quicksort(arr, pindex + 1, end)

def partition(arr, start, end):
    pivot = arr[end]
    pindex = start
    
    # move all elements less than pivot to left of pindex
    for i in range(start, end):
        if arr[i] <= pivot:
            arr[i], arr[pindex] = arr[pindex], arr[i]
            pindex += 1
    arr[end], arr[pindex] = arr[pindex], arr[end]
    return pindex
  • Inplace recursive 算法
  • Time complexity ， worst-case running time

Merge sort

  • Not inplace
  • Time complexity , space complexity

Bucket sort
